column4: Is kubuntu the "better version" of ubuntu? Or are there any significant differences between gnome and KDE?
what does kde offer that gnome doesnt?
It is a matter of prefernce. Personally I use KDE's desktop-drawing program in Enlightenment in GNOME :)
Many other distros enable the "root" acount, and let users log into that using "su". Ubuntu disables it and gives normal (admin) users root's permissions with sudo
